-------Original Message-------

From: Sandra Dodd
Date: 08/31/06 19:20:25
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] new article on Unschooling

http://www.kansascity.com/mld/kansascity/living/15398950.htm?
source=rss&channel=kansascity_living

A new article on unschooling.

What's coolest about it is the expert they quoted was basically
supportive!

Someone said "I turned the TV off because I was tired of fighting
with the cartoon network"
or something and I think the same person was quoted as saying "I
'strew their paths'".


Sandra
